results.title: Sardinian Village Tries to Save an Ancient Tree Scorched by Fire
results.abstract: A team of experts, with the help of local residents and authorities, is trying to revive an ancient olive tree in the hilltop village of Cuglieri that was engulfed in a catastrophic wildfire.

results.title: Miscue After Miscue, U.S. Exit Plan Unravels
results.abstract: President Biden promised an orderly withdrawal. That pledge, compounded by missed signals and miscalculations, proved impossible.

results.title: He Guarded Haiti’s Slain President. And He Was a Suspect in a Drug Inquiry.
results.abstract: Officials are examining whether President Jovenel Moïse’s killing was tied to the drug trade. The man in charge of his safety was a suspect in a major trafficking case, they say.

results.title: U.S. seeks to compel airlines to provide planes to speed evacuation of Afghans.
results.abstract: Military officials are poised to activate the Civil Reserve Air Fleet. The defense secretary must still approve the decision, which would provide 20 planes to evacuation efforts.

results.title: Videos show injuries, desperation as Afghans rush to enter Kabul airport.
results.abstract: The video clips suggest that almost a week after the Taliban seized Kabul, conditions near the airport are not improving and may be worsening.

results.title: Desperation as Afghans Seek to Flee a Country Retaken by the Taliban
results.abstract: A toddler was trampled to death as a crowd surged near the Kabul airport, and many residents who aided America remain in hiding, fearing they will be killed by their new rulers.
des_facet: United States Defense and Military Forces

results.title: Health officials warn people not to treat Covid with a drug meant for livestock.
results.abstract: “You are not a horse,” the Food and Drug Administration said. “Stop it.”

results.title: A former Pence aide says Trump and Miller tried to stymie Afghan refugee efforts.
results.abstract: Olivia Troye said the Trump aide Stephen Miller demanded restrictions on refugees. Mr. Miller said President Biden’s “incompetence” had led to the current chaos.
